raw_stats_gf: (Figure in doc) In contrast, a more marked pattern of spatial structuring was retrieved in the IBD analysis, revealing a varying correlation between genetic and geographical distances over time (Figure 7). Before 1950, no correlation between genetic and geographical distances was found in any of the two species investigated. Between the 1950s and the 2000s, a significant correlation between genetic and geographical distances was found for E. embla.
